comments.body: LGTM. Should the inventory plugin be doing its own logging? @emonty Looks like logging was initially added in https://github.com/ansible/ansible/commit/d548c477c027441d12c10a83aed72424279da8c7

I think it's fine if a plugin wants to log to a file, but the only supported data source the plugins have are the data from the inventory file, so it could add a `log_file` parameter and log there.

Integrating logging with Ansible logging in general would be more complex, and you can read more ranting about this in https://github.com/ansible/ansible/issues/51835

diffHunk:

            # TODO(mordred) Integrate openstack's logging with ansible's logging
            sdk.enable_logging(stream=sys.stderr)

            cloud_inventory = sdk_inventory.OpenStackInventory(
